minus: it looks like i have to type in my name every post.

i love new things! i am enjoying this new kinda board.

By locke on Thursday, April 20, 2000 - 09:33 pm:

Wolvie, I don't know for sure about your 2nd question, but I think Lisa would have to activate the part of the program that issues passwords for private users to get email notified. On the other hand, if you click new messages and play around with it (on the left) you'll find that you can specify how new the messages should be in terms of days, hours,and minutes! You can also select all categories or specify a particular one! The listing will post in a very easy to read format.
